chinese: 葛生蒙楚、蘞蔓于野。予美亡此、誰與獨處。
english: The dolichos grows, covering the thorn trees;The convolvulus spreads all over the waste.The man of my admiration is no more here;With whom can I dwell? - I abide alone.

chinese: 葛生蒙棘、蘞蔓于域。予美亡此、誰與獨息。
english: The dolichos grows, covering the jujube trees;The convolvulus spreads all over the tombs.The man of my admiration is no more here;With whom can I dwell? - I rest alone.

chinese: 角枕粲兮、錦衾爛兮。予美亡此、誰與獨旦。
english: How beautiful was the pillow of horn!How splendid was the embroidered coverlet!The man of my admiration is no more here; -With whom can I dwell? - Alone [I wait for] the morning.

chinese: 夏之日、冬之夜、百歲之後、歸於其居。
english: Through the [long] days of summer,Through the [long] nights of winter [shall I be alone],Till the lapse of a hundred years,When I shall go home to his abode.

chinese: 冬之夜、夏之日、百歲之後、歸於其室。
english: Through the [long] nights of winter,Through the [long] days of summer [shall I be alone],Till the lapse of a hundred years,When I shall go home to his chamber.
